directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add lentils. Cover and simmer until lentils are tender, about 35 minutes. Drain and and cool to room temperature.
Divide lentils among 4 salad plates; layer with mozzarella cheese slices, prosciutto, and fresh basil. Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette over each salad.
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh basil, leaves stripped from stems
1/4 cup balsamic vinaigrette dressing, or as needed
title: Italian Lentil Salad
